document.full_text: three greek policemen were suspended in a brutality investigation on thursday and thousands marched to parliament to protest against the serious injury of a demonstrator during a strike protest a day before.
document.title: greek policemen suspended in brutality probe
lines_and_colors: three greek policemen were suspended in a brutality investigation on thursday and thousands marched to parliament to protest against the serious injury of a demonstrator during a strike protest a day before.
